title: Rin watches Person of Interest 5x13 (Reaction Video) FINALE
author: rophydoes
comment:
Finale ended the same way as the pilot.

It all went full circle.
I'll forever be mad about Root, but dang if this wasn't a beautiful finale.
Im a guy and I never cried on any movie or show but the John scene just made me tear up just thinking about it it was such a great way to end it and it hit the feels hard ;-;

I didn't really expect myself to get SO emotional over John! I had kind of accepted his passing a long time ago... but when it finally happened it fucking crushed me. I think the emotional weight comes from the whole way the episode was orchestrated. We see a young Reese mourning for his father, and a man tells his mother that his father was a "hero who went back and saved four."

who else just cried and cried throughout this episode and just couldn't stop even after it had finished, I have never been so emotional over a tv show before, I just can't believe it's gone, I can't believe I'll never see any of the characters again, I can't believe I'll never see a new episode of person of interest ever again.
